name: Go Fish
overview: Go Fish is a 1-player versus computer card game for the Atari 8-bit computer. The player and the computer take turns asking for their opponent for a card. If the opponent has it, the player receives all of their cards of that value. If not, they have to draw one card from the deck. The player with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner. Cards are graphically displayed on the screen.
